metadata.description: Jump BEYOND THE FRINGE in the very first chapter of this direct-to-digital series, written by star Joshua Jackson (Peter Bishop)! The stakes are high as Peter undertakes a desperate, time-traveling adventure that Walter believes might save the world. Then come back in two weeks to explore an entirely different scenario, featuring a young Peter in an alternate timeline where Peter never died as a boy!
metadata.name: Fringe: Beyond the Fringe
